name: Crew Survival
description:
Take care of all your crew memebers by controlling them. Give orders and build your base. Create furnitures, build floor and walls, gather resources and save your crew.

CONTROLS

WASD + Mouse - Movement
Left mouse button - Select
Right mouse button - Show action menu / Cancel building
Caps lock - Quality settings
X - Scavenge menu

Installation
  1. Download the game
  2. Unzip it
  3. Open Survival.exe
Source code

If you want to modify this game or just want to see how it's made, you can get the whole source project from: https://github.com/emqk/Survival
